p: EOs can vary in quality and quantity depending on several factors, including climate (precipitation, temperature), seasonal variations (day length, light exposure, harvest period), soil composition (available micro-nutrients, application of fertilizers), vegetative cycle stage, genetic variation (plant ecotype or variety), geographic location (altitude), stress during growth or maturity, and the post-harvest drying and storage [ 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10].
